title: Serif font wanted, logo shown
content:
Hi everybody - I am new here!   
   
In fact I searching for serif font. Its for a magazine redesign and for long text. Should be modern but still a bit conservative, quiet/clean, well readable ... I think I would fancy the whiteman/Kent Lew font ...   
   
Any suggestions?   
   
And than I would like to show you a logo I did a few years ago. Its a typologo for a media solutions company.   
   
What do you think?   
   
Cu beck ![logo moccabeans](http://web.archive.org/web/20130310065320im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/33130.gif)
author: yzarcgirl
